chapters.title: Chapter 15: Stronger than Written Law
chapters.info: Sereille Bagand, p. 323 (362)—Amyrlin Seat of just over a hundred years ago. She was raised from the White Ajah, and was somewhat of a legend. She served as Mistress of Novices when Vandene was still in training, and had a repuatation of being one of the strictest taskmistresses around.
